item.title: INFRASTRUCTURE AS CODE (Pulumi + Go)
item.description: Intro So you’ve been playing with the cloud for a bit, you’ve been fiddling with some dials, deploying some new services, and flipping some switches. Production is running smoothly. You get the new requirements to spin up a staging environment so you can test changes before they get into production. Cool. Wait, how did we set up prod again? Introducing the concept Infrastructure as Code, in short this allows you to commit your infrastructure to your version control system.
